XmlAttribute.name: OBJ_18_query
XmlAttribute.value: "SELECT concat(encaminhar, '_', id), resultado FROM cma_v_accoes_por_perfil where perfil = '" + perfil_aprov + "'"

XmlAttribute.name: OBJ_19_query
XmlAttribute.value: "SELECT concat(encaminhar, '_', id), descricao FROM cma_v_accoes_por_perfil where perfil = '" + perfil_aprov + "'"

XmlAttribute.name: OBJ_23_query
XmlAttribute.value: "select unitid, name from organizational_units where organizationid = " + orgid

XmlAttribute.name: OBJ_24_query
XmlAttribute.value: "select username, concat(first_name,' ' ,last_name) from users u , organizational_units ou where u.unitid = ou.unitid and ou.organizationid = " + orgid + " and (-10 = " + unitid + " or u.unitid = " + unitid + ") order by first_name"
